description: Try our easy to follow Fish with Cauliflower Puree recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fish dishes,Pescatarian,Fish,Quick & easy dinner,Low saturated fat,High fibre,High protein,Low salt,Wheat free,Cauliflower
name: Fish with Cauliflower Puree Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine cauliflower and milk in a large saucepan. Bring to the boil over medium-high heat. Reduce to a simmer and cook for 15 minutes or until tender.
Drain milk and reserve. purée cauliflower in a food processor until smooth, adding a little of the milk, if needed. Season with salt and pepper. Set aside and keep warm.

Meanwhile, preheat oven to 200°C. Place fish onto a greased baking dish and season. Drizzle with a little oil. Bake for 10 minutes. Combine walnuts, parsley, garlic and zest and 2 tbs of lemon juice in a bowl. Spoon over fish, drizzle with remaining oil and bake for 5 minutes. Spoon cauliflower purée onto plates and top with fish. Serve with salad and lemon.
